General.Name: Yieh Hsing Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Yieh Hsing Enterprise Co., Ltd. produces and sells steel products in Taiwan. It offers stainless, carbon, alloy, and free-cutting steel wire rods, as well as deformed bars. Its products are used in manufacturing of nuts, screws, wires, automobile parts, machine parts, hardware, tools, etc. The company also exports its products to North America, South America, China, India, Southeast Asia, Northeast Asia, Europe, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Yieh Hsing Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Yieh Phui Enterprise Co., Ltd.
